backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles with access control and blog posts with categories, storage, seeding, and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and tests with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables for the site's color system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document providing root container and loading the React application entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router defining layout and routes for home, posts, details, about, and admin pages with theme support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPostL: Admin post list showing posts with edit/delete actions, loading states, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostEditor: Form for creating or editing posts with title, content, category, cover image, and excerpt handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Tabbed filter component allowing selection of post categories using icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component showing a post’s cover image, title, category, excerpt, and date with link to details.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with site description, navigation links, social icons, and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation links, admin link if authorized, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostMutations.ts: React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting posts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Hooks to fetch all posts, a single post, or posts filtered by category using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, typography, and scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission info, creator bio, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays admin panel with authentication, permission checks, post list, and post editor.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage with hero section, intro text, and feature highlights for theatre content.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a full post with metadata, cover image, and admin edit option.
frontend/src/pages/PostsPage.tsx: Lists posts with category filtering, loading states, and admin new‑post button.
frontend/src/utils/postCategories.ts: Maps post categories to human-readable labels and corresponding icons.
frontend/src/utils/postMetaStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves post cover images and excerpts using localStorage with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus helpers to clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins such as typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the blog’s goals, features, image requirements, and architecture notes for the theatre-focused site.
